# t-slider



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                | Type      | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | disabled optional                                          | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `max`      | `max`      | the maximal value of the slider optional                   | `number`  | `100`       |
| `min`      | `min`      | the minimal value of the slider optional                   | `number`  | `0`         |
| `step`     | `step`     | the step size to increase of decrease when dragging slider | `number`  | `0.1`       |
| `value`    | `value`    | the binding value of the slider optional                   | `number`  | `undefined` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                                        | Description                                   |
| ------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------- |
| `--slider--bar-background-color`            | Background color of the slider bar            |
| `--slider--bar-border-bottom-left-radius`   | Border bottom left radius of the slider bar   |
| `--slider--bar-border-top-left-radius`      | Border top left radius of the slider bar      |
| `--slider--bar-height`                      | Height of the slider bar                      |
| `--slider--bar-position`                    | Position of the slider bar                    |
| `--slider--button-background-color`         | Background color of the slider button         |
| `--slider--button-border`                   | Border of the slider button                   |
| `--slider--button-border-radius`            | Border radius of the slider button            |
| `--slider--button-disabled-hover-transform` | Transform of the slider button disabled hover |
| `--slider--button-height`                   | Height of the slider button                   |
| `--slider--button-hover-transform`          | Transform of the slider button hover          |
| `--slider--button-transition`               | Transition of the slider button               |
| `--slider--button-user-select`              | User select of the slider button              |
| `--slider--button-width`                    | Width of the slider button                    |
| `--slider--button-wrapper-align-items`      | Align items of the slider button wrapper      |
| `--slider--button-wrapper-background-color` | Background Color of the slider button wrapper |
| `--slider--button-wrapper-disabled-cursor`  | Cursor of the slider button wrapper disabled  |
| `--slider--button-wrapper-display`          | Display of the slider button wrapper          |
| `--slider--button-wrapper-height`           | Height of the slider button wrapper           |
| `--slider--button-wrapper-hover-cursor`     | Cursor of the slider button wrapper hover     |
| `--slider--button-wrapper-position`         | Position color of the slider button wrapper   |
| `--slider--button-wrapper-text-align`       | Text left align of the slider button wrapper  |
| `--slider--button-wrapper-transform`        | Transform of the slider button wrapper        |
| `--slider--button-wrapper-user-select`      | User select of the slider button wrapper      |
| `--slider--button-wrapper-width`            | Width of the slider button wrapper            |
| `--slider--button-wrapper-z-index`          | Z index color of the slider button wrapper    |
| `--slider--track-align-items`               | Align items of the slider track               |
| `--slider--track-background-color`          | Background color of the slider track          |
| `--slider--track-border-radius`             | Border radius of the slider track             |
| `--slider--track-disabled-opacity`          | Opacity of the slider track disabled          |
| `--slider--track-display`                   | Display of the slider track                   |
| `--slider--track-height`                    | Height of the slider track                    |
| `--slider--track-margin`                    | Margin of the slider track                    |
| `--slider--track-position`                  | Position radius of the slider track           |
| `--slider--track-width`                     | Width of the slider track                     |
| `--slider-display`                          | Display of the slider                         |
| `--slider-max-width`                        | Max Width of the slider                       |
| `--slider-width`                            | Width of the slider                           |
